name: ext_R4_VerificationResult
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.VerificationResult for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents VerificationResult from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/VerificationResult|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: Describes validation requirements, source(s), status and dates for one or more elements
